fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: RA of the spacecraft after the slew in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: Dec of the spacecraft after the slew in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: ROLL
fields.doc: Roll of the spacecraft after the slew [deg]

fields.name: SLEW_TIME
fields.doc: SOD when the next s/c slew ends

fields.name: SLEW_DATE
fields.doc: TJD when the next s/c slew ends

fields.name: TGT_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SEG_NUM
fields.doc: Swift serial number (for Swift notice types only)

fields.name: MISC_19
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined
